title: Could we add a choke to the solar array power cable

content.raw:
I have found it nearly impossible to grasp the power cable.

You have to have the solar box right up to the edge of the path (not set back), and not in the crook of a bend (so you can stand right at the corner), and even then your fingers are at extreme reach to get to the power cable.

The one time I was able to push the cable forward and then grab it, it required god mode, and then when I lifted the arm, the cable slid right through my fingers :-/.

I propose adding a nicely colored 'choke' like you find on laptop power cables a few centimeters short of the end.  Something with a bit more diameter to grab on to.

I would propose this in addition to my request in #144.
